feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fixed file path for upload files
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix file path by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.2...v1.6.3

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Major update for refresh token, mintor fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [AB-0001]: added web ui for redis docker-compose.dev.yaml by @OleksandrKucherenko in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/260
  • security: depbump 2024-10 by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/347
  • Fix: 404 - page not found #353 by @bilalmirza74 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/354
  • fix: prevent logo height from overflowing into title by @Mujtaba500 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/363
  • Fix: Change button cursor to pointer on hover by @Mujtaba500 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/361
  • Fix: minor UI issues by @bilalmirza74 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/359
  • hotfix: fix refresh mechanism by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/375

New Contributors

  • @OleksandrKucherenko made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/260
  • @bilalmirza74 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/354

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Hot fix for team invite
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hotfix: fixed team invite by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/377

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.4...v1.6.5

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Multipart upload fix
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable multipart uploads for all cloudflare uploads via uppy. by @SvenRH in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/373
  • security: depbump 2024-10-22 by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/384

New Contributors

  • @SvenRH made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix the team invite when there is not stripe key
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • security: Denial of service in http-proxy-middleware - https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c7qv-q95q-8v27 [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/396
  • fix: team invite without stripe by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/399

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.6...v1.6.7
